item.badhabits.reefer.tooltip.boost: Cloaks you in black mist and purges negative effects
item.badhabits.energy_drink_base.tooltip: Crafting ingredient for red and green energy drinks
Applies Weakness II once the effect ends
item.badhabits.green_energy_drink.toolti: Applies Mining Fatigue II once the rush fades
item.badhabits.artificial_seasoning.tool: Doubles the next meal if eaten within 30 seconds
Buff fizzles out if you don't eat in time
block.badhabits.empty_tear_locker.toolti: Charge each side with a Ghast Tear
Breaking discards any socketed ghast tears
item.badhabits.tear_locker.tooltip.effec: Cleanses all negatives and grants 5s immunity on demand
item.badhabits.tear_locker.tooltip.info: Press [V]; works directly from your inventory
item.badhabits.endless_curry_pouch.toolt: Passively doubles all food nutrition and saturation
Works straight from your inventory or belt slot
item.badhabits.icarus_wing.tooltip.effec: Permanent creative flight while worn—no strings attached
item.badhabits.icarus_wing.tooltip.info: Equip in a Curios back slot or your chest slot
item.badhabits.icarus_wing.tooltip.tagli: "If only I'd had slimes instead of honeycombs." — Daedalus
item.badhabits.beast_template.tooltip.us: Tie it to a chain + dragon egg at a smithing table
item.badhabits.dragon_builder_amulet.too: Passive Strength II & Haste II while carried
Works from your inventory or a Curios amulet slot
"Meal prep beats energy shots every time."
message.badhabits.tear_locker_not_found: You need a Tear Locker in your inventory!
message.badhabits.tear_locker_activated: Tear Locker activated! Negative effects cleared.
